import numpy as np # linear algebra
import pandas as pd # data processing, CSV file I/O (e.g. pd.read_csv)

# Input data files are available in the "../input/" directory.
# For example, running this (by clicking run or pressing Shift+Enter) will list all files under the input directory

import os
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

source.23a2595a:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.hist(setosa["sepal_length"],color = "cyan")
plt.title("Iris-Setosa Sepal Length",color = "darkblue",fontsize=18)
plt.xlabel("Sepal Length",color = "red",fontsize=20)
plt.ylabel("number of Sepal Lengths",color = "turquoise",fontsize=15)
plt.show()

source.3d78a23e:
avg_setosa_sepal_length = findaverage(setosa["sepal_length"])
avg_setosa_sepal_width =  findaverage(setosa["sepal_width"])
avg_setosa_petal_length =  findaverage(setosa["petal_length"])
avg_setosa_petal_width =  findaverage(setosa["petal_width"])
source.0ed33431:
plt.scatter(setosa["sepal_length"],setosa["sepal_width"],color = "blue",label = "")
c = plt.scatter(avg_setosa_sepal_length,avg_setosa_sepal_width , color = "red",label= "avg intersection point")
plt.scatter(max_setosa_sepal_length,max_setosa_sepal_width,color = "olive",label = "max intersection point")
plt.scatter(max_setosa_sepal_length,corr_setosa_sepal_length,color = "gray",label = "max sepal length")
plt.scatter(max_setosa_sepal_width,corr_setosa_sepal_length,color="pink",label = "max sepal width")
plt.legend()
plt.xlabel("Sepal Length",color = "red",fontsize = 18)
plt.ylabel("Sepal Width",color = "purple",fontsize = 18)
plt.grid()
plt.title("Relation between Sepal Length and Sepal Width\nfor Iris-Setosa",color = "black",fontsize= 13)
source.40b5326d:
plt.scatter(setosa["petal_length"],setosa["petal_width"],label="")
plt.scatter(avg_setosa_petal_length,avg_setosa_petal_width,color = "yellow",label = "avg intersection point")
plt.scatter(max_setosa_petal_length,max_setosa_petal_width,color="red",label = "max intersection point")
plt.scatter((max_setosa_petal_length,max_setosa_petal_length),corr_setosa_petal_length,color = "purple",label = "max petal length")
plt.scatter(max_setosa_petal_width,corr_setosa_petal_width,color = "darkblue",label = "max petal width")
plt.legend()
plt.grid()
plt.xlabel("Petal Length",color = "brown",fontsize = 18)
plt.ylabel("Petal Width",color = "blue",fontsize = 18)
plt.title("Relation between Petal Length and Petal Width\nfor Iris-Setosa",color="red",fontsize= 13)
